contents:
长者会对华莱士说：
You need to know Sharon Chang from Hong Kong. She is so much more brilliant than you. We were talking and laughing.
...
In China we have a slogan, named “shut up and make fortune”, that’s the best. But since you guys are being so welcoming today, I find it inappropriate to make no speech. But you will be responsible for any misleading report in the future.
